metadata.title: AI Meme Generator: Create Viral Memes Fast | FancyMeme
metadata.description: Create hilarious memes with AI. Just describe your idea - FancyMeme picks the perfect template and writes the caption. Free to start, no design skills needed.

text_to_meme.title: Text-to-Meme AI
text_to_meme.description: Just describe your idea in plain text. Our AI understands context and humor to generate perfect memes automatically.

smart_match.title: Smart Template Match
smart_match.description: AI analyzes your text and picks the most fitting template from our curated library. No meme expertise needed.

emotion_search.title: Emotion-Based Search
emotion_search.description: Search templates by describing feelings like 'frustrated' or 'celebrating'. Find the perfect meme without knowing its name.

templates.title: 50+ Curated Templates
templates.description: Access trending templates from Drake to Distracted Boyfriend. All high-quality, watermark-free, and ready to use.

export.title: Social-Ready Export
export.description: Download in formats optimized for Instagram (1:1), Twitter (16:9), TikTok (9:16), and more.

free.title: Free to Start
free.description: Create 10 memes per day for free. No signup required. Upgrade anytime for unlimited memes.

useCases.title: Perfect For Every Creator
useCases.subtitle: From marketers to meme lovers, FancyMeme helps everyone create engaging content

social_media.title: Social Media Marketing
social_media.description: Stand out on Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Memes get 60% more engagement than regular posts.

team.title: Team Communication
team.description: Lighten up Slack and Teams channels. Break the ice in meetings with perfectly timed memes.

content.title: Content Creation
content.description: Add humor to your blogs, newsletters, and presentations. Make your content memorable.

fun.title: Just for Fun
fun.description: Create inside jokes with friends. Share laughs in group chats. Because memes are life.
